title: Building My New Editing/Gaming PC!
tags: pc build for adobe premiere pro
How to build a gaming pc
description: SPONSOR: Snag an OEM Windows 10 Pro key and use code 'GSVIP' for a 35% Black Friday discount!  (until Dec. 31) Also check out Office 2021:    It's time to build a new editing PC! I'm jumping into the unknown, here... what can Intel's Alder Lake chips bring to the table?   Consider supporting us on Patreon!   Windows Media Creation Tool:    PC parts list:  Intel Core i9 12900K:  ASUS ROG Maximus Z690 Hero:  64GB Corsair Vengeance DDR5 (SPONSOR):  MSI Ventus RTX 2080 Ti:  Phanteks P300A:  ID-COOLING SE-226XT:  1TB Corsair MP600 Pro:  Seasonic Focus 850W:    My studio gear on Amazon: Sony a6600 (Primary):  Sony a6400 (Secondary):  2x Pixio PX277 Prime 165Hz IPS Monitors:  Neewer LED Lighting Kit:  Audio-Technica AT2035:  Yamaha MG10XU Mixer:  Neewer Microphone Arms:  Arrowzoom Sound-Damping Foam Panels:    Follow me on social media: TWITCH:  FACEBOOK:  TWITTER:  INSTAGRAM:    Join our public Discord server:  Chapters: 0:00 - Intro 2:27 - Sponsor 3:21 - Building PC 11:28 - Completed Build 12:00 - Will it POST? 13:04 - Windows Installation 15:15 - BSOD Fix 16:19 - Activating Windows 18:34 - Outro  DISCLOSURES: All Genius links are tied to our Amazon Associate account, from which we earn a small sales commission. Links containing a 'bit.ly' reference forwarding to Newegg are tied to our Rakuten account, from which we earn a small sales commission. All sponsored links and comments will contain the word "SPONSOR" or "AD." Any additional revenue stream will be disclosed with similar verbiage.  #EditingPC #PCBuild
